messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] New email list
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/27/02 2:13:11 PM, bnatkbdpj@onewest.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/27/02 2:13:11 PM, bnatkbdpj@... writes:

<< I hope it's ok to mention this here. Sorry if I overstepped the rules!
Anyway, I have just newly created a list for all LDS unschoolers. >>

It doesn't break any rules of this list, only you didn't give us the address
to join the list!

Do you want me to list it with other LDS link at
http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingotherwise ?

Sandra

messages.subject: New email list
messages.msgSnippet:
I hope it s ok to mention this here.  Sorry if I overstepped the rules! Anyway, I have just newly created a list for all LDS unschoolers.  Please
feel free to
messages.messageBody:
I hope it's ok to mention this here. Sorry if I overstepped the rules!
Anyway, I have just newly created a list for all LDS unschoolers. Please
feel free to join if this would be of interest to you and let anyone else
you feel may be interested know as well ok. Thanks!

Nicole B,
Wife of the most awesome Brad Lee.
Mom to:
Adam 12 (almost 13)
Tyler 11
Klinton 10
Brendan 8
Dakota 6
Preston 4
Jordan 2
~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
In many places it is literally not safe physically for youngsters to go to
school. And in many schools - and it's becoming almost generally true - it
is spiritually unsafe to attend public schools. Look back over the history
of education to the turn of the century and the beginning of the educational
philosophies...which have led us now into a circumstance where our schools
are producing the problems that we face.
~ Boyd K. Packer
